entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in XBRL rule processor (xule) successful, version Check version using Tools->Xule->Version on the GUI or --xule-version on the command line. - xule
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC
[info] Activation of plug-in Validate EFM successful, version 1.21.1. - validate/EFM
[info] Activation of plug-in Inline XBRL Document Set successful, version 1.1. - inlineXbrlDocumentSet

[DQC.IFRS.0008.6819] The calculation in the extension taxonomy rolling up from ChangesInEquity to IncreaseDecreaseThroughTransfersAndOtherChangesEquity in 1004004 - Statement - Estado de cambios en el patrimonio neto (Statement) is the opposite of a calculation defined in the base taxonomy. Check that the calculation is correct or that you have used the correct tag for the two elements identified in the calculation It is possible that the calculation is correct in the case of a reconciliation calculation. Check that the concept IncreaseDecreaseThroughTransfersAndOtherChangesEquity is the correct calculation parent for this element.
Rule version: 17.0.2 -

[DQC.IFRS.0080.8598] ifrs-full:SaleOrIssueOfTreasuryShares has a value of -4,657,000 which is less than zero. This element should not have a negative value.
The properties of this ifrs-full:SaleOrIssueOfTreasuryShares fact are: Period :2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Rule version: 17.0.2 - https://filings.xbrl.org/959800L6L2B2GGN73292/2021-12-31/ESEF/ES/0/sol-2021-12-31-es.zip/sol-2021-12-31-es/reports/sol-2021-12-31-es.xhtml 2064

[DQC.US.0101.9537] The concept ifrs-full:OtherCashReceiptsFromSalesOfEquityOrDebtInstrumentsOfOtherEntitiesClassifiedAsInvestingActivities appears in the financing cashflows of the companies cash flow statement. ifrs-full:OtherCashReceiptsFromSalesOfEquityOrDebtInstrumentsOfOtherEntitiesClassifiedAsInvestingActivities is an investing item and it is expected that this item would only appear in the cash flow generated from investing activities. Please review the calculations defined for the cash flow statement to determine that the correct element has been used for this item.
Rule Element Id:9537 Rule version: 17.0.2 -

[DQC.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 1004004 - Statement - Estado de cambios en el patrimonio neto (Statement) but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncome, ifrs-full:Equity All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 17.0.2 -

[DQC.IFRS.0127.9597] The statement 1004004 - Statement - Estado de cambios en el patrimonio neto (Statement) includes the concept ifrs-full:Equity in the presentation tree. The filing uses an XBRL table called ifrs-full:StatementOfChangesInEquityTable to represent this statement. The table includes the dimensions ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis. The statement presentation group 1004004 - Statement - Estado de cambios en el patrimonio neto (Statement) includes a presentation concept called ifrs-full:Equity. This concept has the following values associated with it that do not appear in the financial statement table ifrs-full:StatementOfChangesInEquityTable:
ifrs-full:Equity = -1,125,000 ifrs-full:Equity = -4,632,000 ifrs-full:Equity = -6,646,000 ifrs-full:Equity = 143,472,000 ifrs-full:Equity = -52,000 ifrs-full:Equity = -6,884,000 ifrs-full:Equity = 146,980,000 ifrs-full:Equity = 22,847,000
The presentation concept is defined for the statement but no fact values are defined in the instance document that use this line item in the table ifrs-full:StatementOfChangesInEquityTable. If the concept appears in the financial statements table, then either a dimension or line item needs to be added to the structure of the definition linkbase that defines the statement. If the item is not represented on the financial statements, then the presentation item should be removed.
In this case the concept Equity is missing from the definition linkbase table nd should be added.
Total Element : ifrs-full:Equity Total period : 2021-12-31 Dimensions : ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis=ifrs-full:NoncontrollingInterestsMember
Rule Element Id:9597 Rule version: 17.0.2 - http://xbrl.ifrs.org/taxonomy/2020-03-16/full_ifrs/full_ifrs-cor_2020-03-16.xsd 2346
